description: React component for the 'Workouts' page in a fitness/training web application. It manages viewing, editing, and assigning workouts for members and trainers, including pagination, role detection, notes editing, and modal forms for workout assignment and editing.

methods.name: safe
methods.description: Utility to return value or fallback if value is null or undefined.

methods.name: toDateStr
methods.description: Converts a date value to a locale date string; returns empty string on invalid input.
